page.title: 01RELIGION
page.content: {ROMAN CATHOLIC}.Church built 1827 is dedicated to the Sacred Heart Of Jesus, Parish priest lives in village.Daughter church St Joseph,Woodford;mass centre Middleton Cheney,Methodist Chapel. Parish covers villages of Boddington, Byfield,Chacombe,Chipping Warden, Charwelton,Culworth,Edgcote,Eydon, Marston St Lawrence,Thenford, Thorpe Mandeville,Sulgrave,Woodford Halse. 80 attend Sunday mass at Aston. Sacred Heart dedication 1st in England. {CHURCH OF ENGLAND}church of St Leonard. Living combined with C.W. and Edgcote. Rectory in C.W.Sunday congregation in AleW 28-35. Right & duty of presenting to the living rotates between the three parishes, as do other functions and rights of precedence.
